definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet

sentences.english: When it drizzles in summer, hiking can be pleasant.
sentences.chinese: 在夏天下毛毛雨的天气里，徒步旅行甚是惬意。

sentences.english: The shower head drizzled water on my head.
sentences.chinese: 莲蓬头把水像下毛毛雨似的洒在我头上。

sentences.english: It may have drizzled during the night.
It was drizzling when the train pulled into the station .
sentences.chinese: 火车进站时，天正下着毛毛雨。

sentences.english: The shower tailed off into a drizzle .
sentences.chinese: 阵雨越来越小，最后变成了毛毛雨。

sentences.english: I walked home in the drizzling rain.
sentences.chinese: 我冒着毛毛雨走回了家。

sentences.english: Some days it's only a little drizzles .
sentences.chinese: 有些天不过是下毛毛雨。

sentences.english: I walked home in the drizzling rain.
sentences.chinese: 乌云压顶，开始飘起了毛毛雨。

sentences.english: Arrange on a platter and drizzle with the horseradish dressing.
sentences.chinese: 安排在与辣根选矿的盛肉盘和毛毛雨。

sentences.english: It drizzled off and on all day.
sentences.chinese: 毛毛雨已经时停时续地下了一整天。

definition: lit. one hair from nine oxen (idiom)/fig. a drop in the ocean
small token/mere trifle (used of one's gifts)
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
a small appetizer/a piece of cake; very easy (idiom)
a downpour/rain bucketing down/fig. to be overwhelmed (with work or things to study)
lit. a cup of water on a burning cart of firewood (idiom); fig. an utterly inadequate measure
lit. minor magician in the presence of a great one (idiom)/fig. to pale into insignificance by comparison
pediatrics/pediatric (department)/sth of little importance/trifle/a child's play/(slang) childish/petty/stingy
